      • supprimerParisCompetition

        public void supprimerParisCompetition(Subscriber subscriber)
                               throws CompetitionException
        delete all bets made by a subscriber on a competition.
        subscriber's account is credited with a number of tokens corresponding to the bets made by the subscriber for the competition.
        Parameters:
        competition - competition's name.
        username - subscriber's username.
        pwdSubs - subscriber's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if (username, password) does not exist.
        CompetitionException - raised if closed competition (closing date is in the past).
        ExistingCompetitionException - raised if there is no competition a_competition.

      • parierSurLeVainqueur

        public void parierSurLeVainqueur(PariWinner pari)
                          throws AuthenticationException,
                                 CompetitionException,
                                 ExistingCompetitionException,
                                 SubscriberException,
                                 BadParametersException
        bet a winner for a competition
        The number of tokens of the subscriber is debited.
        Parameters:
        numberTokens - number of tokens to bet.
        competition - name of the competition.
        winner - competitor to bet (winner).
        username - subscriber's username.
        pwdSubs - subscriber's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if (username, password) does not exist.
        ExistingCompetitionException - raised if the competition does not exist.
        CompetitionException - raised if there is no competitor a_winner for the competition; competition is closed (closing date is in the past); the player is a competitor of the competition.
        SubscriberException - raised if subscriber has not enough tokens.
        BadParametersException - raised if number of tokens less than 0.

      • parierSurLePodium

        public void parierSurLePodium(PariPodium paripod)
                       throws CompetitionException,
                              SubscriberException,
                              BadParametersException
        bet on podium
        The number of tokens of the subscriber is debited.
        Parameters:
        username - subscriber's username.
        pwdSubs - subscriber's password.
        numberTokens - number of tokens to bet.
        competition - the name of the competition.
        winner - winner to bet.
        second - second place.
        third - third place.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if (username, password) does not exist.
        ExistingCompetitionException - raised if the competition does not exist.
        CompetitionException - raised if there is no competitor with name a_winner, a_second or a_third for the competition; competition is closed (closing date is in the past); the player is a competitor of the competition.
        SubscriberException - raised if subscriber has not enough tokens.
        BadParametersException - raised if number of tokens less than 0.

      • solderPariWinner

        public void solderPariWinner(Competitor winner)
                      throws CompetitionException,
                             BadParametersException
        settle bets on winner.
        Each subscriber betting on this competition with winner a_winner is credited with a number of tokens equals to:
        (number of tokens betted * total tokens betted for the competition) / total number of tokens betted for the winner
        If no subscriber bets on the right competitor (the real winner), the tokens betted are credited to subscribers betting on the competition according to the number of tokens they betted. The competition is then deleted if no more bets exist for the competition.
        Parameters:
        competition - the name of the competition.
        winner - competitor winner.
        managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingCompetitionException - raised if the competition does not exist.
        CompetitionException - raised if there is no competitor a_winner for the competition; competition still opened.
        BadParametersException

      • solderPariPodium

        public void solderPariPodium(Competitor winner,
                    Competitor second,
                    Competitor third)
                      throws CompetitionException,
                             BadParametersException
        settle bets on podium.
        Each subscriber betting on this competition with the right podium is credited with a number of tokens equals to:
        (number of tokens betted * total tokens betted for the competition) / total number of tokens betted for the podium
        If no subscriber bets on the right podium, the tokens betted are credited to subscribers betting on the competition according to the number of tokens they betted. The competition is then deleted if no more bets exist for the competition.
        Parameters:
        competition - the name of the competition.
        winner - the winner.
        second - the second.
        third - the third.
        managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingCompetitionException - raised if the competition does not exist.
        CompetitionException - raised if two competitors in the podium are the same; no competitor (firstname, lastname, borndate or name for teams) a_winner, a_second or a_third for the competition; competition still opened
        BadParametersException

      • consulterParis

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> consulterParis()
        consult bets on a competition.
        Returns:
        a list of String containing the bets for the competition.

        Ajoute un competiteur à la compétition
        Parameters:
        newCompetitor - le nouveau competiteur
        Throws:
        CompetitionException - est levée si le competiteur a dejà été ajouté .
        BadParametersException - est levée si le competiteur n'est pas instancié .
